question.title: Buddy Strings
question.content:
Given two strings A and B of lowercase letters, return true if and only if we can swap two letters in A so that the result equals B.

 

Example 1:

Input: A = "ab", B = "ba"
Output: true

Example 2:

Input: A = "ab", B = "ab"
Output: false

Example 3:

Input: A = "aa", B = "aa"
Output: true

Example 4:

Input: A = "aaaaaaabc", B = "aaaaaaacb"
Output: true

Example 5:

Input: A = "", B = "aa"
Output: false

 

Constraints:

  • 0 <= A.length <= 20000
  • 0 <= B.length <= 20000
  • A and B consist only of lowercase letters.
